titleStmt.title: Strange news from Bishop-Hatfield in Hertford-shire, January the 25 1680. Being a relation of Elizabeth Freeman, a single woman, aged about one and thirty years ... taken before Sr. Joseph Jordan, knight, and Richard Lee, D. D. Rector of Hatfield, and Chaplain Ordinary to his Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Wilkison, Richard

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
